trends: There have been no other sightings in Nellysford
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI took my camera outside to take a photo of the sunset over the Blue Ridge mountains and also the contrails above. A clyndrical disc object appeared moving across the sky heading southwest. I could see the sun clearing reflected off the top of the metallic object.
